history_and_architecture.name: The Loire Castles
history_and_architecture.description: A collection of luxurious castles along the Loire River, showcasing Renaissance, Gothic, and Classical architecture from the 15th and 16th centuries.

highlights.name: Chambord
features: Renaissance and Gothic architectural styles with a double helix staircase possibly designed by Leonardo da Vinci.
A vast park with bike paths and hiking trails for nature walks.
activities: Guided tours of the castle and park.

highlights.name: Chenonceau
features: Known as the 'Ladies' Castle' due to its association with women such as Catherine de Medici.
Gardening workshops led by experts.

highlights.name: Amboise
features: Home to a museum dedicated to Leonardo da Vinci’s works and innovations.
Historic tours of the castle rooms.

history_and_architecture.name: The Medieval City of Carcassonne
history_and_architecture.description: A medieval city renowned for its fortified walls and historical architecture, designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
highlights: Walking tours along the city walls with scenic views.
Interactive tours of the castle focusing on its history and architecture.
activities: Trying regional dishes such as cassoulet.

history_and_architecture.name: The Gothic Cathedral of Notre-Dame
history_and_architecture.description: An iconic Gothic cathedral built between the 12th and 14th centuries, famous for its architecture, stained glass, and sculptures.
highlights: Guided tours revealing the history and architectural details of the cathedral.
Visiting the crypt with archaeological artifacts.
Climbing the towers for panoramic city views and a closer look at Gothic elements.

gastronomic_tours.name: Wine Tastings in Bordeaux
gastronomic_tours.description: An exploration of Bordeaux's wine culture and vineyards, offering a deep dive into the region's wine-making heritage.

highlights.name: La Cité du Vin
features: A cultural center focused on wine heritage, offering tastings and workshops.
Workshops on pairing wine with food.

highlights.name: Winery Tours
features: Vineyard tours showcasing local grape varieties and wine-growing techniques.

gastronomic_tours.name: Gastronomic Tour in Lyon
gastronomic_tours.description: A tour of Lyon's traditional cuisine and famous markets, highlighting regional cheeses, chocolates, and hearty dishes.

highlights.name: Traditional Bouchon
features: Cozy Lyonnais restaurants serving local delicacies such as 'joubie' and 'pot de fer.'

highlights.name: Les Halles de Lyon Market
features: A bustling market offering fresh produce, meats, and cheeses.
activities: Tastings and interactions with local producers.

gastronomic_tours.name: Market in Provence
gastronomic_tours.description: A market experience featuring Provence's olive oil, cheeses, and farm-fresh produce.
highlights: Culinary workshops on traditional dishes such as ratatouille and bouillabaisse.

natural_landscapes.name: Verdon National Park
natural_landscapes.description: Verdon National Park is renowned for its stunning canyons, crystal-clear waters of the Verdon River, and breathtaking natural landscapes. It is an ideal destination for outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers.

highlights.name: Kayaking
features: Visitors can rent a kayak and explore the Verdon River, which flows through breathtaking canyons with steep cliffs and lush greenery.
activities: Perfect way to enjoy the beauty of the landscape from the water and experience the adrenaline rush of navigating its wild waters.

highlights.name: Hiking Trails
features: The Sentier Blanc Martel hiking trail, approximately 15 km long, passes through some of the park's most beautiful areas.
activities: Hikers can enjoy the unique flora and fauna of the region, as well as impressive rock formations.

highlights.name: Lake Sainte-Croix
features: Lake Sainte-Croix is a perfect spot for swimming, boasting clear blue waters and picturesque beaches.
activities: Visitors can enjoy water sports such as swimming, surfing, and sailing.

natural_landscapes.name: Beaches of the French Riviera
natural_landscapes.description: The French Riviera is famous for its luxurious beaches, charming towns, and vibrant nightlife. It is the ideal place for a seaside holiday, enjoying delicious cuisine, and experiencing cultural events.

highlights.name: Nice Beaches
features: The beaches of Nice offer wide spaces for sunbathing, where visitors can soak up the sun and enjoy beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea.
activities: Strolling along the promenade is not only a chance to enjoy the food but also to take in the stunning scenery.

highlights.name: Cannes
features: Cannes, known for its international film festival, boasts a lively waterfront lined with numerous shops, cafes, and restaurants.
activities: Walking along the beach allows visitors to soak in the atmosphere and view yachts in the harbor.

highlights.name: Saint-Tropez
features: Saint-Tropez is famous for its nightlife and numerous clubs where visitors can enjoy music and dancing.
activities: The town is also home to many artists, and visitors can find galleries showcasing their work.

natural_landscapes.name: Pyrénées Natural Park
natural_landscapes.description: Pyrénées Natural Park is known for its rich natural heritage, including mountains, meadows, forests, and rivers. It is a place where visitors can appreciate nature's beauty and engage in outdoor activities.

highlights.name: Birdwatching
features: The park offers guided tours with ornithologists who help visitors observe various bird species inhabiting the region.
activities: This is a perfect opportunity to learn more about local wildlife and capture stunning photographs.

highlights.name: Hiking
features: Pyrénées Natural Park offers numerous hiking trails of varying difficulty levels.
activities: While hiking, tourists may encounter waterfalls, caves, and rare plants.

highlights.name: Nature Relaxation
features: Many picnic areas are equipped for outdoor dining, where visitors can enjoy meals in the fresh air.
activities: This is a great way to relax after a day of outdoor activities.

culture.name: The Louvre in Paris
culture.description: The Louvre is one of the largest and most famous museums in the world, located in Paris. It houses many masterpieces of art, architectural wonders, and cultural artifacts that impress visitors with their beauty and history.

highlights.name: Exhibitions
features: Visitors can enjoy viewing renowned paintings, such as Leonardo da Vinci's 'Mona Lisa,' the 'Venus de Milo,' and the 'Winged Victory of Samothrace.'

highlights.name: Architecture
features: The architecture of the Louvre combines historical elements with modern ones.

highlights.name: Café in the Louvre
features: After a day of exploring the exhibits, visitors can relax at the café in the Louvre.

culture.name: Festival in Avignon
culture.description: The Avignon Theatre Festival is one of the largest and most renowned theater festivals in the world, held annually in July in the city of Avignon. It is a vibrant event that brings together theater practitioners, artists, and art enthusiasts from around the globe.

highlights.name: Theatrical Performances
features: The festival offers a variety of theatrical productions, ranging from classical to contemporary.

highlights.name: Street Performances
features: During the festival, the streets of Avignon are filled with artists conducting street performances.

highlights.name: Workshops
features: The festival also features acting masterclasses.

culture.name: Monaco Grand Prix
culture.description: The Monaco Grand Prix is one of the most prestigious car races in the world. Held annually in May, this event attracts car racing fans from around the globe. The picturesque backdrop of Monaco adds to the unique atmosphere of the race.

highlights.name: Spectacular Race
features: Visitors can enjoy watching the excitement of Formula 1 racing in one of the most prestigious circuits.

highlights.name: Festive Atmosphere
features: The streets of Monaco come alive with music, events, and parties during the race weekend.

active_recreation.name: Hiking in Mercantour National Park
active_recreation.description: Mercantour National Park is renowned for its vast mountain landscapes, incredible flora and fauna, and a wide selection of hiking trails suitable for various skill levels.

highlights.name: GR52 Trail
features: Picturesque views of mountain peaks, gorges, and lush landscapes
Approximately 200 km trail suitable for both beginners and experienced hikers

highlights.name: Mountain Accommodations
features: Mountain hostels and campsites for overnight stays
Opportunities to meet fellow travelers and share experiences

highlights.name: Nature Photography
features: Scenic spots for photography along trails
Great lighting from morning mists to sunset

active_recreation.name: Cycling in Bordeaux
active_recreation.description: Bordeaux offers fantastic cycling routes to explore the region’s nature and cultural heritage, including the Garonne River and nearby vineyards.

highlights.name: Vélo’b System
features: Convenient bike rental system across the city
Ideal for tourists and locals to travel around Bordeaux

highlights.name: Garonne River Valley
features: Scenic routes along the river with park views and river vistas
Opportunities to visit museums, cafés, and local attractions

highlights.name: Winery Visits
features: Tastings of local wine varieties in gardens and wine cellars
Tours with local winemakers sharing winemaking insights

active_recreation.name: Kayaking on the Loire River
active_recreation.description: The Loire River, known for its picturesque landscapes and historic castles, offers ideal conditions for kayaking, allowing travelers to enjoy the natural beauty and cultural heritage of the region.

highlights.name: Kayak Rental
features: Available routes with scenic views of riverbanks and castles
Guided tours that explore the region's history and nature

highlights.name: Safety
features: Life jackets and essential equipment for safe kayaking
Instructors provide safety recommendations

highlights.name: Photography Opportunities
features: Beautiful landscapes and castles for memorable photos
Reflection views on the water surface
